title: Process a Partial Rent Payment
description: A tenant makes a partial rent payment. The property manager must handle the payment and the remaining balance according to company policy and state law.

tasks.description: Check company policy and state law to determine if partial payments can be accepted without waiving eviction rights.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the correct procedure for handling partial payments.

tasks.description: Accept and record the partial payment in the tenant's ledger.
tasks.expected_outcome: The payment is correctly recorded, leaving a remaining balance.

tasks.description: Send a formal notice to the tenant acknowledging the partial payment and stating the remaining balance due and the deadline for payment.
tasks.expected_outcome: A clear communication is sent to the tenant regarding their outstanding balance.
